items.title: Document Chatbot
description: AI-powered chatbot that processes PDF files and answers queries based on document content.
Uses LangChain and PyPDF2 to extract text, convert it into vectors, and store in FAISS.
Employs Hugging Face models and Pinecone for query understanding and content-based responses.

items.title: AI Text Editor
description: Intelligent text editor that summarizes documents and provides context-aware suggestions.
Utilizes Sentence Transformers (MiniLM) for semantic similarity and BART for text summarization.
Uses Cosine Similarity to identify and summarize relevant document chunks.

items.title: DocAssist
description: Developed a website using Next.js with user authentication using JWT tokens and MongoDB.
Integrated various features:
Document Chatbot: Allows users to interact with documents, powered by LangChain and PyPDF2.
AI Text Editor: Summarizes documents using MiniLM and BART.
OCR: Extracts text from images using Pytesseract and Pillow.
Paraphraser: Rewrites text using Transformers and LanguageTool Python.
Research Paper Template: Converts randomly formatted text into structured IEEE research paper using NLTK and LaTeX.
Integrated Flask for Python-based functionality, error handling, and cross-origin support via Flask-CORS.

items.title: Portfolio Website
description: Built a modern and responsive portfolio website using Next.js and TypeScript.
Implemented interactive project filtering and dynamic content loading.
Optimized for performance and SEO with metadata and responsive layouts.

items.title: Fire and Smoke Detection System
description: Developed a fire and smoke detection system using image processing, computer vision, and deep learning.
Implemented fire segmentation using HSV and YCbCr color spaces.
Motion detection through frame differencing, optical flow, and background subtraction.
Estimated the fire-affected area using contour detection and pixel-based measurements.
Used edge detection, Local Binary Patterns, and a fine-tuned MobileNetV2 model for smoke detection.
